alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dawson County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Oconto to 6 miles southwest of Willow Island. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eddyville. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 232. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Nebraska.
